item.title: What Actually Matters in AI for 2026: A Reality Check for Businesses
item.description: At Husig.ai, we spend our days in the trenches of digital transformation—navigating messy spreadsheets, legacy databases, and the manual processes that keep businesses running. We’re often asked if we’re building the next “world-changing” super-intelligence. Our answer? No. We’re building tools that help you finish your work by 5 PM. However, to build for today, we have to keep an eye on where the giants are heading. We recently analyzed the 2026 outlooks from Microsoft and Google Cloud.
